thread.title: Husband kills wife for not permitting him second marriage
thread.title_full: Husband kills wife for not permitting him second marriage

title: Husband kills wife for not permitting him second marriage
text:
Husband kills wife for not permitting him second marriage | 0 0 
LAHORE: A man killed his wife on Monday after she refused to let him marry a second time. 
The accused Ali Murtaza killed his wife using a hammer and stick in Millat area, police said. 
Murtaza was arrested by police. 
The woman's body has been sent for post-mortem. 
The deceased was mother of two children.
